###5.6.7
* 2. 
```{r}
not_cancelled <- flights %>% 
  filter(!is.na(dep_delay), !is.na(arr_delay))
```
```{r}
not_cancelled %>%
  group_by(dest) %>%
  summarize(flights = n())
```

```{r}
not_cancelled %>%
  group_by(tailnum) %>%
  summarize(sum(distance))
```
